title: Cool Shock Old B.t.
alternative_title: B.T. "The Wicked Gentleman" ; 魔老紳士ビーティー
status: B.T. "The Wicked Gentleman" ; 魔老紳士ビーティー
description:
Description :
        The one-shot takes place 60 years after the events of Cool Shock B.T. and stars an older B.T. and Koichi Mugikari. Koichi ends up losing his house after falling for a scam from the "Outlaw Guys". B.T. helps his childhood friend get back what he deserves.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: The "say Hi To Old Virginia" Incident
Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Eerie Freckled Old Geezer Incident
